alert.note: Alert for Harper; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sedgwick, northeastern Harper and northwestern Sumner Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Viola to 5 miles west of Argonia. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Haysville, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Colwich, Conway Springs, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Eastborough, Argonia, Viola, West Wichita, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Danville, Freeport and Oaklawn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 10. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 40 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
